name: Bad Cat (Coin)
description:
You have a Cat. You have a House. You also have Tasks to do.

Bad Cat is an Arcade Game where you have to do Tasks around your house while  preventing your Cat from breaking stuff and also taking care of it (you mostly take care of the house but you still take care of it a little).

Use the WASD (or other keyboard equivalents) to Move around the House.
You can only see inside the room you are in and the adjacent rooms

Find the objects described in your Task List (objects mostly in red) and press and hold E near them to complete the Task .

The Cat will do an Action about every 10 seconds (it will also make a noise). 
 If it is just standing still, it will break an object after a few seconds(you can press E near it to stop it). 

If the Cats breaks 5 Objects,  it's Game Over.

Completing Tasks will give you Points. If you take too long to complete a Task you will lose Points.

Tasks in Red are caused by the Cat, they make you lose more Points than Blue Tasks.

Try to get the most Points!
(the final score is the most points you had during the game)

Made for the 6th Extra Credits Game Jam.  This was my first Game Jam :)
